resources.string: The next generation blockchain built for business, is picking up where others left off. We are busy building a platform with a modern approach.
Only 5 million coins will be generated
Inflation slows every 1 million coins, only 1 million coins will be generated in the first year with the remaining 5 million over the next 50 years.
With a maximum of 5 million coins, Proof of Work, Proof of Stake and Master Nodes there is no better coin to earn rewards while simultaneously securing the network.
Ignition is a 3rd generation blockchain built on a foundation of legends
Generate your Seed and save it in a safe place, this seed is the only way to recover your wallet if your phone gets lost, stolen etc.
Click the generate button to get your seed.
